{{cpp/thread/lock_guard/title|~lock_guard}}
{{cpp/thread/lock_guard/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 |
~lock_guard();
}}

Releases the ownership of the owned mutex.

Effectively calls {{c|m.unlock()}} where {{tt|m}} is the mutex passed to the {{tt|lock_guard}}'s constructor.
